title: Teen killed in west Nashville shooting
content:
NASHVILLE, TN (WSMV) -
A 16-year-old boy was killed in a shooting in west Nashville on Christmas Eve.
The shooting happened inside his home in the 400 block of Wilclay Drive on Thursday afternoon.
The victim has been identified as Luan Le, a junior at Hillwood High School.
Le’s mother is overseas at this time. Police are still working to determine who was inside the home at the time of the shooting.
Le’s last text message was sent from his phone at 12:47 p.m. His body was found at 1:30 p.m.
Police said Le was involved in selling marijuana. They believe his death is likely a result of that.
“From all accounts, this is a drug-related shooting,” Metro police spokesman Don Aaron said. “According to the 18-year-old who found him was also involved in taking marijuana from this residence to other places.”
Police said they are currently pursuing strong leads.
Luan Le, 16, shot to death today inside his 427 Wilclay Dr home. Investigation indicates drug related. Strong leads being pursued.
— Metro Nashville PD (@MNPDNashville) December 25, 2015
